Class BlockVirtualPools

    ACLResources, BulkResources<BlockVirtualPoolRestRep>, QuotaResources, Resources<BlockVirtualPoolRestRep>, TopLevelResources<BlockVirtualPoolRestRep>

    public class BlockVirtualPools
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<BlockVirtualPoolRestRep>
implements TopLevelResources<BlockVirtualPoolRestRep>, ACLResources, QuotaResources
    Block Virtual Pools resource.

    Base URL: /block/vpools
